Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
AttributeClass representing one product attribute
BestItemsVarious types of user's product preferences
BlackBoxHandles Preference objects, calls their set and getPreference method
CartClass representing a cart filled with class of CartItem
CartItemOne cart item (one product with a unique ID)
CartItemPrinterCart item printer that prints one item of the cart
CartManagerA manager for cart.php
CatalogManagerA manager for catalog.php
CategoriesClass representing a tree of categories
CategoriesManagerParent of all managers that use categories
CategoryClass representing one category node
CategoryMenuPrinterCategory printer that prints a menu from a category tree
CheckOutManagerA manager for finished orders
CheckOutObjectClass for preference objects that user chooses during check out (checkOut.php)
CheckOutPreferenceClass for handling preferences on checkOut page (payment and shipping types)
CommentClass representing one user comment
DetailedProductProduct class (with more details) used by item.php
GlobalRatingsClass representing global ratings
ItemAddedManagerThe job of this class is adding items to the shopping cart
ItemManagerThis is a manager for item.php
LinkedItemsProducts that have been ordered together with one or more specified products
ManagerMost important manager, it is constructed on every page load
PageControlPreferenceClass for handling preferences on catalog.php page (sorting, items on page)
PageControlsClass with controls on a catalog.php page
PaymentTypeRepresents one payment option
PreferenceBase class for all preferences
ProductProduct class used by catalog.php
ProductRatingsClass for product ratings (either global or one user's) of one product
ProfileManagerA manager for profile.php, handles registration and profile changes
RatingCategoriesClass representing a tree of categories with their ratings
RatingCategoryClass representing one category node with category ratings
ShippingTypeRepresents one shipping option
ShoppingManagerFather of CartManager and ItemAddedManager
SimilarItemsProducts similar to specified product
SortedCategoriesDeals with sorting of categories in the left menu
TopItemsTop products from specified categories
TopItemsOnPageNoUser's preference of how many items to display on a catalog page
TopPaymentTypeUser's preference of payment options
TopShippingTypeUser's preference of shipping types
TopSortingOrderUser's preference of catolog ordering
UserCategoriesClass representing a tree of categories for the left menu
UserCategoryClass representing one right menu category node
UserRatingsClass representing ratings of current user
 All Data Structures Files Functions Variables
